article_title: A crisis of confidence in the VA?

article_metadata.description: Veteran Ann Weeby, member of Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America, talks about her reactions to the VA hospital controversy and the need for the VA to communicate directly with the veterans about the mismanagement of services of the organization.
